text: @realDonaldTrump Who gives a damn about the name of Princeton's policy center. Putin offered Afghan militants bounties to kill U.S. soldiers, you knew about it and did nothing. There are also 127K dead Americans because of your failure to take the coronavirus seriously. #TRE45ON #TraitorTrump
